Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.name: didChangeRevealingState(cell:)
Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.abstract: This is called when the state changes and if there is an animation, it is called at the start of the animation.

Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.name: didStartPanGesture(cell:)
Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.abstract: Called when the user sarts horizontally sliding the cell.

Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.name: didFinishAnimatingInState(cell:revealingState:)
Protocols/RevealingTableViewCellDelegate.abstract: Called at the end of an animation.

Extensions/UITableView.html#/s:FE22Revea.name: closeAllCells(exceptThisOne:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/s:FE22Revea.abstract: Closes all the cells (unless you specify a cell to leave open).

Extensions/UITableView.html.name: UITableView
Extensions/UITableView.html.abstract: Extension for easy closing of RevealingTableViewCells in a tableView

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell/Revealing.name: closed
Classes/RevealingTableViewCell/Revealing.abstract: The default state (none of the views underneath are revealed)

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.name: uiView_revealedContent_left
Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.abstract: The content to be revealed, pinned to the left of the cell’s contentView. Optional.

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.name: uiView_revealedContent_right
Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.abstract: The content to be revealed, pinned to the right of the cell’s contentView. Optional.

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.name: uiView_mainContent
Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:v.abstract: This will be the view that slides sideways to reveal some content underneath. It needs to be pinned to the cell’s contentView using the layoutConstraint (among others).

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:F.name: setRevealingState(_:animated:)
Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html#/s:F.abstract: Sets the cell’s revealing state with an optional animation.

Classes/RevealingTableViewCell.html.name: RevealingTableViewCell
